metadata.title: CVE-2017-12197 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - untriaged
metadata.description:
It was found that libpam4j up to and including 1.8 did not properlyvalidate user accounts when authenticating. A user with a valid passwordfor a disabled account would be able to bypass security restrictions andpossibly access sensitive information.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam4j-java - 1.4-2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpam4j package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4-2+deb8u1build0.16.04.1').
